Quote: They will if you ask nicely. Spare change for a hungry old man?
The coin is appreciated, but not as much as your smile!
It's a long, long way to Ba Sing Se, but the girls in the city, they look so pretty!
They kiss so sweet that you really got to meet the girls from Ba Sing Se!
I know this is going to sound weird, but I think the swamp is calling to me.
No offense to the swamp, but I don't see any land there to land on.
Maybe you should listen to Aang. Something about this place feels ... alive.
I'm sure there are lots of things that are alive here and if we don't wanna wind up getting eaten by them, we need to find Appa as fast as we can.
No, I asked the swamp. It said this was fine. Right, swamp? 'No problem, Sokka!'
Stupid swamp! Dumb, ugly vines!
No, that's what they call a 'lemoo'. Saw one at a traveling show once. Real smart they say.
You think everything tastes like possum chicken.
Now, what would a lemoo need a shirt fer?
I protect the swamp from folks that want to hurt it, like this fella with his big knife.
Oh the swamp is a mystical place all right. It's sacred. I reached enlightenment right here under the banyan-grove tree.
See this whole swamp is actually just one tree spread out over miles. Branches spread and sink, take root, and spread some more. One big, living organism. Just like the entire world.

You think you're any different from me or your friends or this tree? If you listen hard enough, you can hear every living thing breathing together. You can feel everything growing. We're all living together, even if most folks don't act like it. We all have the same roots and we are all branches of the same tree.
Set my lines by the river bed! Caught ten fish and I killed 'em dead! Cut 'em and gut 'em and I tossed the heads in the water to keep them catgators fed.
You know, scared some folks, swung some vines, the usual.
Tastes just like arctic hen.
Oh, he don't eat no bugs! That's people food.
Well, I hope you realize now that nothing strange was going on here.
I told you, we were hungry. I'm eating a giant bug!
